//LookUp(MyUVVSettings;Title="Status Tooltip").Wert

"Select possible status for this checkpoint"

"Select possible status for this checkpoint"
//LookUp(MyUVVSettings;Title="Status Tooltip").Wert

//Parent.Error
If(IsBlank(SCheckpointStatus1),
    "Status1 must not be empty",
If(!IsBlank(SCheckpointStatus2) &&
    (SCheckpointStatus2 = SCheckpointStatus1 ||
     SCheckpointStatus2 = SCheckpointStatus3 ||
     SCheckpointStatus2 = SCheckpointStatus4 ||
     SCheckpointStatus2 = SCheckpointStatus5),
    "Status2 is not unique",
If(!IsBlank(SCheckpointStatus3) &&
    (SCheckpointStatus3 = SCheckpointStatus1 ||
     SCheckpointStatus3 = SCheckpointStatus2 ||
     SCheckpointStatus3 = SCheckpointStatus4 ||
     SCheckpointStatus3 = SCheckpointStatus5),
    "Status3 is not unique",
If(!IsBlank(SCheckpointStatus4) &&
    (SCheckpointStatus4 = SCheckpointStatus1 ||
     SCheckpointStatus4 = SCheckpointStatus2 ||
     SCheckpointStatus4 = SCheckpointStatus3 ||
     SCheckpointStatus4 = SCheckpointStatus5),
    "Status4 is not unique",
If(!IsBlank(SCheckpointStatus5) &&
    (SCheckpointStatus5 = SCheckpointStatus1 ||
     SCheckpointStatus5 = SCheckpointStatus2 ||
     SCheckpointStatus5 = SCheckpointStatus3 ||
     SCheckpointStatus5 = SCheckpointStatus4),
    "Status5 is not unique"
)))))

"Select possible status for this checkpoint"
//LookUp(MyUVVSettings;Title="Status Tooltip").Wert

"Select possible status for this checkpoint"
//LookUp(MyUVVSettings;Title="Status Tooltip").Wert

Set(SCheckpointF1,"");
If(!IsBlank(DCField1.Selected.Title),
    Set(SCheckpointF1,
    "DisplayOrder:1, Question:"
    &DCField1.Selected.Title
    &", ResponseType:"
    &DCField1.Selected.ResponseType
    &If(DCField1.Selected.ResponseType="Radio"||
        DCField1.Selected.ResponseType="Combobox",
        ", Choices:"
        &DCField1.Selected.Choices
        &","
    ,//Else
        ","
    ))
);
Set(SCheckpointFlexForm,
    SCheckpointF1 &
    SCheckpointF2 &
    SCheckpointF3 &
    SCheckpointF4 &
    SCheckpointF5
);

"Select possible status for this checkpoint"
//LookUp(MyUVVSettings;Title="Status Tooltip").Wert

Set(SCheckpointF2,"");
If(!IsBlank(DCField2.Selected.Title),
    Set(SCheckpointF2,
    "DisplayOrder:2, Question:"
    &DCField2.Selected.Title
    &", ResponseType:"
    &DCField2.Selected.ResponseType
    &If(DCField2.Selected.ResponseType="Radio"||
        DCField2.Selected.ResponseType="Combobox",
        ", Choices:"
        &DCField2.Selected.Choices
        &","
    ,//Else
        ","
    ))
);
Set(SCheckpointFlexForm,
    SCheckpointF1 &
    SCheckpointF2 &
    SCheckpointF3 &
    SCheckpointF4 &
    SCheckpointF5
);

Set(SCheckpointF3,"");
If(!IsBlank(DCField3.Selected.Title),
    Set(SCheckpointF3,
    "DisplayOrder:3, Question:"
    &DCField3.Selected.Title
    &", ResponseType:"
    &DCField3.Selected.ResponseType
    &If(DCField3.Selected.ResponseType="Radio"||
        DCField3.Selected.ResponseType="Combobox",
        ", Choices:"
        &DCField3.Selected.Choices
        &","
    ,//Else
        ","
    ))
);
Set(SCheckpointFlexForm,
    SCheckpointF1 &
    SCheckpointF2 &
    SCheckpointF3 &
    SCheckpointF4 &
    SCheckpointF5
);

"Select possible status for this checkpoint"
//LookUp(MyUVVSettings;Title="Status Tooltip").Wert

        DCField4.Selected.ResponseType="Combobox",
        ", Choices:"
        &DCField4.Selected.Choices
        &","
    ,//Else
        ","
    ))
);
Set(SCheckpointFlexForm,
    SCheckpointF1 &
    SCheckpointF2 &
    SCheckpointF3 &
    SCheckpointF4 &
    SCheckpointF5
);

"Select possible status for this checkpoint"
//LookUp(MyUVVSettings;Title="Status Tooltip").Wert

    ,//Else

Set(SCheckpointFlexForm,
    SCheckpointF1 &
    SCheckpointF2 &
    SCheckpointF3 &
    SCheckpointF4 &
    SCheckpointF5
